channel.title: CVE Feed for WPMU DEV -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPMU DEV -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47189|2024-06-04T09:31:14.044Z -- wpmu%20dev -- defender%20security
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in WPMU DEV Defender Security allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Defender Security: from n/a through 4.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-25592|2024-03-15T13:56:02.689Z -- wpmu%20dev -- broken%20link%20checker
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPMU DEV Broken Link Checker allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Broken Link Checker: from n/a through 2.2.3.

item.title: CVE-2022-44581|2024-06-05T19:18:00.731Z -- wpmu%20dev -- defender%20security
item.description: Insecure Storage of Sensitive Information vulnerability in WPMU DEV Defender Security allows : Screen Temporary Files for Sensitive Information.This issue affects Defender Security: from n/a through 3.3.2.
